page.title: 06Botanical Gardens
page.content: The Botanic Gardens are located on the B5244 road in the picturesque olde world village of{CHURCHTOWN}on the Preston side of{SOUTHPORT}two miles from the town centre.The amenities of the Botanic Gardens include an open air aviary and pets corner which are extremely popular with all age groups. there is an interesting museum(free), boating lake,with rowing boats and canoes.There are delightful picturesque rose gardens,bowling green and tennis courts.In addition to a fully equipped children's playground containing swings, slides, roundabouts etc....,there is an extensive recreation field on which organised races and sports may be held.Located some seventy-five yards from the main entrance and parking facilities, there are two attractive cafes.
